products.name: Hazelnut Latte
products.description: Smooth espresso combined with hazelnut syrup and steamed milk for a nutty, rich flavor.

products.name: Vanilla Latte
products.description: Creamy espresso latte with a hint of sweet vanilla syrup and silky steamed milk.

products.name: Caramel Macchiato
products.description: Layers of espresso, vanilla, steamed milk, and caramel drizzle for a sweet indulgence.

products.name: Cappuccino
products.description: Classic Italian espresso topped with thick, velvety foam and a dusting of cocoa powder.

products.name: Americano
products.description: Bold and strong espresso diluted with hot water for a clean, deep black coffee taste.

products.name: Matcha Latte
products.description: Premium Japanese matcha powder whisked with steamed oat milk for an earthy, creamy drink.

products.name: Cold Brew
products.description: Slowly steeped for 12 hours in cold water, producing a smooth, less acidic coffee concentrate.

products.name: Flat White
products.description: Double ristretto shots with microfoam milk, stronger than a latte with a velvety texture.

products.name: Espresso
products.description: Pure, concentrated shot of rich espresso with a thick golden crema on top.

products.name: Pour Over Coffee
products.description: Carefully hand-brewed single origin coffee using the pour over method for a clean, complex cup.

products.name: Coconut Latte
products.description: Espresso with creamy coconut milk and a hint of vanilla for a tropical coffee experience.

products.name: Pumpkin Spice Latte
products.description: Seasonal favorite with pumpkin puree, cinnamon, nutmeg, and espresso topped with whipped cream.

products.name: Ristretto
products.description: A short, concentrated espresso shot with less water for an intense, sweeter flavor profile.

products.name: Iced Americano
products.description: Chilled espresso diluted with cold water and ice for a smooth, bold coffee experience.

products.name: Honey Latte
products.description: Smooth espresso sweetened naturally with honey and combined with steamed milk.

products.name: Dirty Matcha
products.description: Layered matcha latte topped with a rich shot of espresso for a unique bitter-sweet taste.

products.name: Strawberry Smoothie
products.description: Fresh strawberry blended with yogurt and honey for a refreshing and healthy drink.

products.name: Taro Milk Tea
products.description: Creamy taro root blended with milk tea and chewy tapioca pearls for a sweet purple drink.

products.name: Chocolate Milkshake
products.description: Rich and creamy chocolate milkshake topped with whipped cream and chocolate drizzle.

products.name: Lemon Squash
products.description: Freshly squeezed lemon with sparkling water and a hint of mint for a zesty refreshing drink.
